description: Experience world-class service at The LaLiT Golf & Spa Resort Goa

propertyName: Planet Hollywood Beach Resort Goa Opens in new window
description: Offering an outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre, Planet Hollywood Beach Resort Goa is located on the Uttorda Beach.

Located in Marmagao, Noel Guest House provides air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. Among the various facilities are a garden and a terrace. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, and currency exchange for guests.
2-BR apartment for 6 with a pool is set in Serula. The air-conditioned accommodation is 11 km from Candolim.

Set in Bambolim, Amrapali-House of Grace features an outdoor swimming pool, a terrace and a shared lounge. Providing a restaurant, the property also has a bar. The property offers a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi is available.

Boasting a fitness centre, a shared lounge, and a terrace, Bay Terraces by Vista Rooms features accommodation in Marmagao with free WiFi and pool views. The air-conditioned accommodation is 33 km from Candolim.

Featuring a terrace, OYO 12647 Swarnam is located in Old Goa, a 20-minute walk from Viceroy’s Arch. Popular points of interest nearby include Se Cathedral and Church of St Francis of Assisi. Free WiFi is available and in-house parking is provided.

Located on Cavelossim Beach in Goa, Radisson Blu Resort features Goan-Portuguese-inspired architecture with bright exterior colours. Its offers rooms with free Wi-Fi and a free-form outdoor pool, spa and fitness centre.
Offering an outdoor swimming pool, a fitness centre and a spa and wellness centre, La Grace Resort is located in Benaulim. Free WiFi access is available in the public areas of this resort.

FabExpress Horizon Shalom Porvorim is offering accommodation in Porvorim. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and room service. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.9 km from Mall De Goa.
